title: What are the supported Audio formats in Unity?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I want to import an Audio Asset into my game.
  • I want to know which audio format I should use.

sections.title: Cause
content: You want to use an Audio Asset in Unity and you would like to know which audio formats are supported in the editor.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity supports importing the following audio file formats:
The following tracker module file formats are also supported:
The tracker module assets works the same way as any other Audio Assets in Unity except waveform preview can be rendered to the Asset Import Inspector

sections.title: More Information
content: For more information on audio clips then see this document here
For more information on tracker modules then see this document here
